item.title: [BHS2][DedicatedServers] - Racks T02C25 T02C26 T02C27
item.description:
Dec 21, 21:14 UTC
Identified - Start time : 21/12/2022 16:40 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the racks T02C25 T02C26 T02C27 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Cooling system malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
